data_description.name: A name for this Inception hub
data_description.token: An Inception User API token. Available under Users > Remote / Web Access > User API Token.
data_description.host: The host address of your Inception hub. If no protocol is specified, http:// will be used.

unlock.name: Unlock
unlock.description: Unlocks a door. If a time is provided, a timed unlock is used.

time_secs.name: Seconds
time_secs.description: Number of seconds to grant access.
